description: Halloween is a fun autumn festival celebrated on the night of October 31st when children dress in costumes and go door-to-door asking for candy. Donâ€™t miss the chance to carve your pumpkin into a Jack-o'lantern and shout out "Trick or treat!" Have a scary good time!

config: *This is a non-federal holiday. It is not officially recognized. For more information about paid holidays please visit Justikia.
